useCase.name: User Searches and Selects Data Package
useCase.description: User search for matching data packages based on keywords and selects one for more details.
useCase.trigger: User inputs search keywords into the search interface.

mainSequence.step: Interface receives search keywords and requests data packages from the Data Registry.
Registry processes the search request and returns a list of matching data packages to the Interface.
Interface displays the list of matching packages to the Consumer.
Consumer selects a data package based on its description.
Interface sends a request for details of the selected data package to the Registry.
Registry provides the details of the selected data package to the Interface.
Interface displays the details of the selected data package to the Consumer.
